Chapter 1872 - The Three Stages Of The Great Realm

When he saw that resplendent rain of light envelop Su Yi, Lin Feng’s expression grew strange.

Although he’d hidden himself in the Sky-Covering Boat earlier, he too witnessed that calamitous and taboo Great Realm Grand Tribulation. He saw the gods from across endless space and time, and he even saw them join forces and attack. The sight was so astonishing that he almost suspected he was dreaming!

Unfortunately for him, shortly after, he lost all awareness. He didn’t see the Sword of the Nine Hells rising into the firmament.

Naturally, he didn’t see the master he revered appear above it and force the gods to retreat, either!

Even so, what he did see was enough to make Lin Feng realize how extraordinary his master’s reincarnation was. His mere Great Realm Grand Tribulation ripped through Divine Venerate Tian Huang’s Laws of Annihilation with ease. Even the gods made an appearance!

But by far the most extraordinary part was that Su Yi survived and successfully proved his Dao!

All of this completely overturned Lin Feng’s imagination and perception of reality.
